Reason: The 'bucket.size' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the rendering process by determining the size of the buckets used for rendering. The clamping of the value between 16 and 512 shows that the configuration can have a significant impact on the number of buckets in each direction, leading to notable performance variations in the rendering speed and quality of the final image. Since rendering is a time-expensive operation, any changes in the bucket size can have a substantial effect on the overall system performance.
